stimulusHtml: Which of the following transactions would be counted as investment spending in the calculation of a nationâ€™s gross domestic product?
choicesHtml: Robert buys 100 shares of stock in an energy company.
Ming purchases a new delivery truck for her bakery business.
Latasha pays a mechanic to repair her personal car.
Sam earns interest on Canadian government bonds.
Taylor receives unemployment benefits when he loses his job.
